## List of algorithms

  - Generalized Linear Models (OLS, Ridge Regression, Lasso, Bayesian Regression, Stochastic Gradient Descent - SGD, Perceptron, Robustness regression: outliers and modeling errors)
  - Linear and Quadratic Discriminant Analysis
  - Kernel ridge regression
  - Support Vector Machines (regression and classification)
  - Stochastic Gradient Descent 
  - Nearest Neighbors
  - Gaussian Processes
  - Cross decomposition
  - Naive Bayes
  - Decision Trees
  - Ensemble methods
  - Multiclass and multilabel algorithms
  - Feature selection
  - Neural network models (supervised)
